page.title: 05CLUBS>WOMENS'INSTITUTES>
page.content: Though there is a Womens'Institute in South Hill,activities are held outside the survey area.STOKE CLIMSLAND W.I. was formed in 1919.In1986,one lady celebrates 6o years of membership, while several claim 4o years.The w.i. is friendly,lively,and increasingly popular,with an average attendance of 45 at each monthly meetng.It has many talented members,and does well in Group and County competitions.Members run an over 6o Club,a Drama Group,a Musical Appreciation evening in winter and walks in summer.There is a Bridge Club.Husbands are welcome on all these occasions.Subjects of National and local interest are discussed.Coach outings take place in summer and social gatherings allthe year round.A weekly Yoga class is held and day courses arranged regularly in many subjects chosen by members.
